--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
PORTFOLIO SUMMARY:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Client Name:           Global Multi-Asset Institutional Fund
Account Number:        AQ-88421-STK
Target Volatility:     10.0% (Annualized)
Stacking Multiplier:   1.5x Notional Exposure
Core Benchmark:        MSCI World Index (Net TR)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
EXECUTIVE STRATEGY OVERVIEW
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The "Volatility Stacking" approach involves maintaining a core 100% exposure to 
traditional beta (Equities/Bonds) while "stacking" uncorrelated return streams 
(Trend Following, Long Volatility, Global Macro) on top using capital-efficient 
instruments. This creates a synthetic exposure exceeding 100% of Net Asset Value 
(NAV) while managing absolute risk through strict volatility targeting.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

COMPONENT                   CURRENT (%)    TARGET (%)    ACTION        NOTIONAL
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- US Large Cap Equity       42.5%          40.0%         SELL          $4.0M
- Int'l Developed Equity    18.2%          20.0%         BUY           $2.8M
- Emerging Markets          10.3%          10.0%         REBAL         $0.5M
- Global Govt Bonds         29.0%          30.0%         BUY           $1.6M

STACKED ALPHA LAYER (50% NOTIONAL OVERLAY)
- Managed Futures (Trend)   12.0%          20.0%         EXPAND        $12.8M
- Long Volatility (Tail)    4.5%           10.0%         EXPAND        $8.8M
- Macro Relative Value      15.0%          10.0%         REDUCE        $8.0M
- Systematic Carry          18.5%          10.0%         REDUCE        $13.6M

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1. REALIZED VOLATILITY (TRAILING 12M):
   - Core Equity Beta: 14.2%
   - Stacked Portfolio: 9.8%
   - Diversification Benefit: 4.4% (Alpha generated through lower variance drag)

2. CORRELATION MATRIX (TARGET):
               | Equities | Bonds | Trend | Volatility |
   Equities    |   1.00   |  0.15 | -0.12 |   -0.72    |
   Bonds       |   0.15   |  1.00 |  0.25 |    0.05    |
   Trend       |  -0.12   |  0.25 |  1.00 |    0.18    |
   Volatility  |  -0.72   |  0.05 |  0.18 |    1.00    |

3. MAXIMUM DRAWDOWN (2025):
   - Portfolio: -6.4% (Oct 2025)
   - Benchmark: -11.2% (Oct 2025)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
REBALANCE RATIONALE & MARKET COMMENTARY
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

DE-LEVERAGING CARRY EXPOSURE: Due to the flattening yield curves observed in 
Q4 2025, the Systematic Carry component has seen a compression in risk-adjusted 
returns. We are reducing the Carry stack from 18.5% to 10% to preserve capital.

EXPANDING TREND FOLLOWING: Managed Futures demonstrated a correlation of -0.22 
during the mid-year equity correction. We are increasing the Trend stack to 
20% to capture extended momentum in the commodities and currency sectors 
expected in H1 2026.

LONG VOLATILITY OVERLAY: As the VIX remains near historical 20th percentile 
levels despite geopolitical uncertainties, we are doubling our Long Volatility 
exposure (Tail Protection). This provides "convexity" to the portfolio, 
ensuring the Vol-Stacking mechanism performs during "black swan" events.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
REGULATORY & COMPLIANCE DISCLOSURES
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

DERIVATIVES USAGE: This portfolio utilizes Exchange Traded Futures and Total 
Return Swaps (TRS) to achieve stacked exposure. Per SEC Rule 18f-4, the 
Value-at-Risk (VaR) is monitored daily. The portfolio remains within the 200% 
limit of the VaR of the designated reference index.

LIQUIDITY RISK: The stacked layers consist entirely of Level 1 and Level 2 
assets. 95% of the portfolio can be liquidated within T+3 business days. 
Managed Futures and Long Volatility components are traded on regulated 
exchanges (CME, CBOE) to minimize counterparty risk.

TAX IMPLICATIONS: Rebalancing will trigger realized capital gains in the 
Domestic Equity sleeve. We will utilize tax-loss harvesting in the Emerging 
Markets sleeve to offset liabilities where applicable.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
EXECUTION STEPS
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Liquidate $4.0M US Equity (SPY/IVV equivalents).
2. Allocate $2.8M to MSCI EAFE via automated VWAP execution.
3. Reset Futures Notional: Roll Mar'26 Trend contracts to achieve 20% stack.
4. Purchase OTM Put options on S&P 500 for the Tail Risk layer.
5. Finalize Risk Report and verify Vol-Target compliance by Jan 16, 2026.
